file_insights.change_description: Added aria-label attribute to IconButton component
file_insights.component_context: Project list item menu trigger button
file_insights.accessibility_impact: Improved screen reader accessibility by providing descriptive label for icon-only button

patterns_discovered.description: Icon buttons without text content require aria-label for accessibility compliance
Session focused on singular, targeted accessibility improvements
patterns_discovered.relevance: Systematic accessibility audit and remediation approach

gotchas_discovered.description: aria-label text should be contextual and specific ('Open project menu' vs generic 'Menu')
gotchas_discovered.impact: Improves clarity for screen reader users navigating multiple interactive elements

gotchas_discovered.description: Icon-only buttons must always have accessible labels (aria-label or aria-labelledby)
gotchas_discovered.impact: Non-compliant buttons fail WCAG accessibility standards

approach_outcome.strategy: Direct attribute addition to existing component

recommendations.description: Conduct comprehensive audit of ProjectsPage for other icon buttons missing aria-labels
recommendations.rationale: Single button fix suggests potential similar gaps elsewhere in component

recommendations.description: Establish linting rule or component pattern requiring aria-label on all IconButton instances
recommendations.rationale: Prevent regression of accessibility requirements in future development

recommendations.description: Add accessibility testing to verify aria-label functionality with screen readers
recommendations.rationale: Ensure accessibility improvements are properly validated
